name: UK Call Centre
tagline: NOT JUST ANOTHER MESSAGE TAKING SERVICE
description:
UK Call Centre Ltd provide a telephone answering service 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. With over 15 years experience in the call handling industry, UK Call Centre provide call handling solutions for a wide variety of clients ranging from sole traders to large international corporations across the UK. UK Call Centre Ltd has an expanding customer base which is extremely varied covering private medical practicioners, vets, cosmetic surgeons, IT companies, engineers, solicitors and many more.
All clients have different needs and priorities and the team work closely with them from start to finish to ensure exact requirements are met. UK Call Centre Ltd offer a wide variety of services bespoke to meet your business needs. Providing a friendly and reliable representation of your company, exceptional service with professional standards, unbeatable account management, speedy answering times all delivered via an experienced team. UK Call Centre Ltd supports businesses with round the clock services at a fraction of in-house staff costs. With offsite answering services your business will receive 24/7/365 support to increase your business opportunities, minimise your exposure and strengthen your business overall. Whether out of hours or during your working day the team at UK Call Centre Ltd provide a guaranteed professional service using up to date technology.
